Reviews.Title: Very grateful great Value
Reviews.Author: Javier B Estrada
Reviews.Content: It took a while to update the windows 7 OS but after a couple of days it has work great .

Reviews.Title: Was given a different product because the seller didnt have Lenovo Thinkpad in stock
Reviews.Author: David Nowak
Reviews.Content: The seller called and emailed right away but unfortunately the replacement system should never been sold the keyboard was replaced with a new one and the battery would never hold a charge and power adapter would get extremely hot

Reviews.Title: overheats,minimal battery life
Reviews.Author: Cassandra Snyder
Reviews.Content: I wish I would not have bought this laptop. It overheats within 30 minutes of use. The power cord also overheats, and the battery only has life of about 30 minutes. It's not a good buy.
